00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include "memvirtu.h"
00043 #include "lowparam.h"
00044 #include "lowmacro.h"

00046 #include "vectorop.h"

00048 
00049 void MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(vector wpos, vector cpos)
00050 {
00051    vector temp_m;
00052 
00053    vecminus(temp_m, wpos, camptr->eye);
00054    MSD_lowApplyDisplayTransformation(camptr->drot, temp_m, cpos);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void MSD_lowInverseDisplayTransformation(vector cpos, vector wpos)
00058 {
00059    vecmult(wpos, cpos, camptr->drot);
00060    vecplus(wpos, camptr->eye, wpos);
00061 
00062 /*
00063  *  w_trans(camptr->drot, cpos, wpos, camptr->eye) ;
00064  */
00065 }
00066 
00067 void MSD_lowApplyDisplayTransformation(matrix mat, vector v, vector res)
00068 {
00069    int i;
00070 
00071    for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00072    {
00073       res[i] = mat[i][0] * v[0] + mat[i][1] * v[1] + mat[i][2] * v[2];
00074    }
00075    res[3] = 1.0;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void MSD_lowExecInverseDisplayTransformation(vect2 s1, vector s2,
00079                                              vect2 v1, vector v2)
00080 {
00081    vector w1, w2;
00082    real   k;
00083 
00084    if (camptr->mode == 1)
00085    {
00086       w1[0] = s1[0];
00087       w1[1] = s1[1];
00088       w2[0] = s2[0];
00089       w2[1] = s2[1];
00090       w1[2] = w2[2] = camptr->scale;
00091    }
00092    else
00093    {
00094       k     = camptr->cdis / camptr->scale;
00095       w1[0] = k * s1[0];
00096       w1[1] = k * s1[1];
00097       w2[0] = k * s2[0];
00098       w2[1] = k * s2[1];
00099       w1[2] = w2[2] = 0.0;
00100    }
00101    MSD_lowInverseDisplayTransformation(w1, v1);
00102    MSD_lowInverseDisplayTransformation(w2, v2);
00103 }
00104 
00105 char MSD_lowExecDisplayTransformation(vector v1, vector v2,
00106                                       vect2 s1, vect2 s2)
00107 {
00108    vector t1, t2;
00109    real   d1, d2;
00110 
00111    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(v1, t1);
00112    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(v2, t2);
00113    if (MSD_lowClip3Dimension(t1, t2) == TRUE)
00114    {
00115       if (camptr->mode == 1)
00116       {
00117          d1 = t1[2];
00118          d2 = t2[2];
00119       }
00120       else
00121       {
00122          d1 = d2 = camptr->cdis;
00123       }
00124       s1[0] = t1[0] / d1 * camptr->scale;
00125       s1[1] = t1[1] / d1 * camptr->scale;
00126       s2[0] = t2[0] / d2 * camptr->scale;
00127       s2[1] = t2[1] / d2 * camptr->scale;
00128       return(TRUE);
00129    }
00130    return(FALSE);
00131 }
00132 
00133 void MSD_lowDisplayTransformationScale(vector v1, vector v2, vector s1, vector s2)
00134 {
00135    vector t1, t2;
00136    real   d1, d2;
00137 
00138    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(v1, t1);
00139    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(v2, t2);
00140    if (camptr->mode == 1)
00141    {
00142       d1 = t1[2];
00143       d2 = t2[2];
00144    }
00145    else
00146    {
00147       d1 = d2 = camptr->cdis;
00148    }
00149    s1[0] = t1[0] / d1 * camptr->scale;
00150    s1[1] = t1[1] / d1 * camptr->scale;
00151    s2[0] = t2[0] / d2 * camptr->scale;
00152    s2[1] = t2[1] / d2 * camptr->scale;
00153 }
00154 
00155 char MSD_lowClipDisplayTransformation(vector vs, vector ve, vector dvs, vector dve)
00156 {
00157    vector w1, w2, c1, c2;
00158 
00159    veccopy(w1, vs);
00160    veccopy(w2, ve);
00161    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(w1, c1);
00162    MSD_lowDisplayTransformation(w2, c2);
00163    if (MSD_lowClip3Dimension(c1, c2) == TRUE)
00164    {
00165       MSD_lowInverseDisplayTransformation(c1, dvs);
00166       MSD_lowInverseDisplayTransformation(c2, dve);
00167       return(TRUE);
00168    }
00169    return(FALSE);
00170 }
